tuv.seg: Legislative background for accessing environmental information
Cúlra reachtach: Rochtain ar fhaisnéis comhshaoil
To access environmental information you can use Freedom of Information legislation or the European Communities (Access to Information on the Environment) Regulations 2007 to 2014

Chun faisnéis comhshaoil a fháil, is féidir leat úsáid a bhaint as an reachtaíocht maidir le Saoráil Faisnéise nó as Rialacháin na gComhphobal Eorpach (Rochtain ar Fhaisnéis maidir leis an gComhshaol) 2007 go 2011
An unofficial consolidation of these Regulations (SI 133 of 2007, SI 662 of 2011 and SI 615 of 2014 (pdf)) is available here (pdf)
Tá comhdhlúthú neamhoifigiúil de na Rialacháin seo (IR 133/2007, IR 662/2011 agus IR 615/2014 (pdf)) le fáil anseo (pdf)

These Regulations give effect to Directive 2003/4/EC on Public Access to Information on Environmental Matters, which provides that individuals have the right to access environmental information held by public authorities

Tugann na Rialacháin seo feidhm don Treoir maidir le Rochtain Phoiblí ar Fhaisnéis faoi Chúrsaí Comhshaoil, Treoir 2003/4/CE, a fhorálann go bhfuil ceart rochtana ag daoine aonair maidir le faisnéis faoin gcomhshaol arna coinneáil ag údaráis phoiblí

This is the first of 2 Directives to implement the Aarhus Convention (UNECE Convention on Access to Information, Public Participation in Decision-Making and Access to Justice in Environmental Matters 1998)

Tá an Treoir seo ar an gcéad cheann de dhá Threoir chun Coinbhinsiún Aarhus (Coinbhinsiún UNECE maidir le Rochtain ar Fhaisnéis, Rannpháirteachas an Phobail le linn Cinntí a Dhéanamh agus Rochtain ar Cheartas i gCúrsaí Comhshaoil 1998) a chur i bhfeidhm
Ireland ratified the Aarhus Convention on 20 June 2012
Dhaingnigh Éire Coinbhinsiún Aarhus ar 20 Meitheamh 2012
The Aarhus Convention lays down a set of basic rules to promote citizens' involvement in environmental matters and improve enforcement of environmental law
Leagann Coinbhinsiún Aarhus síos sraith rialacha bunúsacha chun rannpháirtíocht na saoránach a spreagadh i gcúrsaí comhshaoil agus forghníomhú dlí na timpeallachta a fheabhsú

It allows the public to have access to environmental information, provides for participation in environmental decision-making, and allows the public to seek redress when environmental law is infringed
Tugann sé rochtain don phobal ar fhaisnéis comhshaoil, déanann sé foráil do rannpháirtíocht i gcinntí comhshaoil, agus tugann sé deis don phobal sásamh a lorg nuair a sháraítear dlí na timpeallachta
The EU approved the Aarhus Convention in 2005 (Council Decision 2005/370/EC of 17 February 2005)
Cheadaigh an tAE Coinbhinsiún Aarhus in 2005 (Cinneadh 2005/370/CE ón gComhairle an 17 Feabhra 2005)
The second Directive implementing the Aarhus Convention is Directive 2003/35/EC on Public Participation in respect of the Drawing up of Certain Plans and Programes relating to the Environment

Is í an dara Treoir a chuireann Coinbhinsiún Aarhus i bhfeidhm ná Treoir 2003/35/CE maidir le Rannpháirtíocht Phoiblí i leith Pleananna agus Cláir Áirithe a bhaineann leis an gComhshaol a Tharraingt Suas
This deals with public participation in decision-making
Baineann sí seo le rannpháirtíocht phoiblí i ndéanamh cinntí
It provides that member states must ensure that mechanisms exist to facilitate public participation in decisions about the environment
Foráiltear inti go gcaithfidh ballstáit a chinntiú go bhfuil meicníochtaí i bhfeidhm chun rannpháirtíocht an phobail i gcinntí comhshaoil a éascú
Under the provisions of this Directive, members of the public are entitled to appeal relevant decisions of public bodies by way of judicial review
Faoi fhorálacha na Treorach seo, tá baill den phobal i dteideal achomharc a dhéanamh i gcoinne cinntí ábhartha de chuid chomhlachtaí poiblí trí athbhreithniú breithiúnach
